items.label: BTree
items.detail: Can handle equality and range queries on data that can be sorted into some ordering (default).

items.label: Hash
items.detail: Can handle simple equality queries, but no ordering. Faster than BTree, if ordering is not needed.

items.label: Gist
items.detail: Generalized Search Tree. A framework for building specialized indices for custom data types.

items.label: Gin
items.detail: Generalized Inverted Index. Useful for indexing composite items, such as arrays or text.

items.label: SpGist
items.detail: Space-partitioned Generalized Search Tree. For implenting a wide range of different non-balanced data structures.

items.label: Brin
items.detail: Block Range Index. If the data has some natural correlation with their physical location within the table, can compress very large amount of data into a small space.
